verses.name: Ezekiel 34:18
verses.text: Seemeth it a small thing unto you to have eaten up the good pasture, but ye must tread down with your feet the residue of your pastures? and to have drunk of the deep waters, but ye must foul the residue with your feet?

verses.name: Ezekiel 34:19
verses.text: And as for my flock, they eat that which ye have trodden with your feet; and they drink that which ye have fouled with your feet.

verses.name: Ezekiel 34:20
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God unto them; Behold, I, even I, will judge between the fat cattle and between the lean cattle.
